RegisterDescription.ToolTip: Point Grey Research USB3 Vision Camera Interface

Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for device information and control.
Category.Description: Category for device information and control.

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for image format control features.
Category.Description: Category for image format control features.

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for acquisition and trigger control features.
Category.Description: Category for acquisition and trigger control features.

Category.Name: DigitalIOControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the digital input and output control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the digital input and output control features.

Category.Name: AnalogControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the analog control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the analog control features.

Category.Name: UserSetControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the User Set control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the User Set control features.

Category.Name: ChunkDataControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Chunk Data control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Chunk Data control features.

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the transport layer control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the transport layer control features.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: Name of the manufacturer of the device.
StringReg.Description: Name of the manufacturer of the device.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceScanType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Scan type of the sensor.
Enumeration.Description: Scan type of the sensor.

Command.Name: DeviceReset
Command.ToolTip: Immediately resets and reboots the device
Command.Description: This is a command that immediately resets and reboots the device.

Integer.Name: U3VDeviceCapability
Integer.ToolTip: Describes Device Capability.
Integer.Description: Describes Device Capability.

Boolean.Name: UserNameAvailable
Boolean.ToolTip: Set if User Defined Name available.
Boolean.Description: Set if User Defined Name available.

Boolean.Name: AccessPrivilegeAvailable
Boolean.ToolTip: Set if Heartbeat/Access Privilege is available.
Boolean.Description: Set if Heartbeat/Access Privilege is available.

Boolean.Name: MessageChannelSupported
Boolean.ToolTip: Set if the device supports a Message Channel.
Boolean.Description: Set if the device supports a Message Channel.

Boolean.Name: TimestampSupported
Boolean.ToolTip: Set if the device supports a timestamp register.
Boolean.Description: Set if the device supports a timestamp register.

Integer.Name: StringEncoding
Integer.ToolTip: String Encoding of the BRM.
Integer.Description: String Encoding of the BRM.

Boolean.Name: FamilyRegisterAvailable
Boolean.ToolTip: Set if the device supports the Family Name register.
Boolean.Description: Set if the device supports the Family Name register.

Boolean.Name: SBRMSupported
Boolean.ToolTip: Set if the device supports a SBRM.
Boolean.Description: Set if the device supports a SBRM.

Boolean.Name: EndianessRegistersSupported
Boolean.ToolTip: Set if the device supports the Protocol Endianess and Implementation Endianess registers.
Boolean.Description: Set if the device supports the Protocol Endianess and Implementation Endianess registers.

Boolean.Name: WrittenLengthFieldSupported
Boolean.ToolTip: Set to 1 if the device sends the length_written field in the SCD section of the WriteMemAck command.
Boolean.Description: Set to 1 if the device sends the length_written field in the SCD section of the WriteMemAck command.

Integer.Name: U3VDeviceCapabilityHigh
Integer.ToolTip: Describes Device Capability.
Integer.Description: Describes Device Capability.

Integer.Name: U3VDeviceCapabilityLow
Integer.ToolTip: Describes Device Capability.
Integer.Description: Describes Device Capability.

Integer.Name: U3VDeviceConfigurationHigh
Integer.ToolTip: Describes Device Configuration.
Integer.Description: Describes Device Configuration.

Integer.Name: U3VDeviceConfigurationLow
Integer.ToolTip: Describes Device Configuration.
Integer.Description: Describes Device Configuration.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkThroughputLimit
Integer.ToolTip: Limits the maximum bandwidth of the data.
Integer.Description: Limits the maximum bandwidth of data that will be streamed out by the device.

Integer.Name: TestPendingAck
Integer.ToolTip: Test PENDING_ACK feature.
Integer.Description: Test PENDING_ACK feature.

Integer.Name: DeviceMaxThroughput
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum bandwidth of the data that can be streamed out of the device.
Integer.Description: Maximum bandwidth of the data that can be streamed out of the device

Boolean.Name: HueEnabled
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables/disables hue adjustment.
Boolean.Description: Enables/disables hue adjustment.

Enumeration.Name: HueAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic hue level adjustment.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the mode for automatic hue level adjustment. The exact algorithm used to implement this adjustment is device-specific.

Float.Name: Hue
Float.ToolTip: Hue of the image in degrees.
Float.Description: Hue of the image in degrees.

Enumeration.Name: GainAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the automatic gain control (AGC) mode.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic gain control (AGC) mode.

Float.Name: Gain
Float.ToolTip: Gain applied to the image in dB
Float.Description: Gain applied to the image in dB.

Float.Name: AutoGainLowerLimit
Float.ToolTip: Lower limit of the Auto Gain (dB) parameter
Float.Description: Lower limit of the Auto Gain (dB) parameter

Float.Name: AutoGainUpperLimit
Float.ToolTip: Upper limit of the Auto Gain (dB) parameter
Float.Description: Upper limit of the Auto Gain (dB) parameter

Boolean.Name: BlackLevelEnabled
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables/disables black level adjustment.
Boolean.Description: Enables/disables black level adjustment.

Enumeration.Name: BlackLevelAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic black level adjustment.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the mode for automatic black level adjustment. The exact algorithm used to implement this adjustment is device-specific.

Boolean.Name: SharpnessEnabled
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables/disables sharpness adjustment.
Boolean.Description: Enables/disables sharpness adjustment.

Enumeration.Name: SharpnessAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic sharpness adjustment.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the mode for automatic sharpness adjustment.

Integer.Name: Sharpness
Integer.ToolTip: Sharpness of the image.
Integer.Description: Sharpness of the image.

Boolean.Name: SaturationEnabled
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables/disables saturation adjustment.
Boolean.Description: Enables/disables saturation adjustment.

Enumeration.Name: SaturationAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic saturation adjustment.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the mode for automatic saturation adjustment.

Float.Name: Saturation
Float.ToolTip: Saturation of the image in percent
Float.Description: Saturation of the image in percent.

Float.Name: Gamma
Float.ToolTip: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity.
Float.Description: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity.

Boolean.Name: GammaEnabled
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables/disables gamma correction.
Boolean.Description: Enables/disables gamma correction.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixel data.
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixel data.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to Mono 8.
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to Mono 8.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono12Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to Mono 12 IIDC-msb Packed.
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set Mono 12 IIDC-msb Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono12p
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to 12-bit monochrome pixel lsb packed.
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to 12-bit monochrome pixel lsb packed.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono16
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to Mono 16.
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to Mono 16.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGR8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to Bayer GR 8
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to Bayer GR 8.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to Bayer RG 8
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to Bayer RG 8.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGB8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to Bayer GB 8
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to Bayer GB 8.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerBG8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to Bayer BG 8
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to Bayer BG 8.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGR12p
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to 12-bit bayer GR lsb packed.
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to 12-bit bayer GR lsb packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG12p
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to 12-bit bayer RG lsb packed.
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to 12-bit bayer RG lsb packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGB12p
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to 12-bit bayer GB lsb packed.
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to 12-bit bayer GB lsb packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerBG12p
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to 12-bit bayer BG lsb packed.
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to 12-bit bayer BG lsb packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGR12Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to BayerGR 12 IIDC-msb Packed.
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set BayerGR 12 IIDC-msb Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG12Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to BayerRG 12 IIDC-msb Packed.
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set BayerRG 12 IIDC-msb Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGB12Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to BayerGB 12 IIDC-msb Packed.
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set BayerGB 12 IIDC-msb Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerBG12Packed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to BayerBG 12 IIDC-msb Packed.
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set BayerBG 12 IIDC-msb Packed.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGR16
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to BayerGR 16.
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set BayerGR 16.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerRG16
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to BayerRG 16.
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set BayerRG 16.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerGB16
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to BayerGB 16.
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set BayerGB 16.

EnumEntry.Name: BayerBG16
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to BayerBG 16.
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set BayerBG 16.

EnumEntry.Name: YCbCr411_8_CbYYCrYY
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to 8-bit YCbCr 4:1:1 (CbYYCrYY).
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to 8-bit YCbCr 4:1:1 (CbYYCrYY).

EnumEntry.Name: YCbCr422_8_CbYCrY
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to 8-bit YCbCr 4:2:2 (CbYCrY).
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to 8-bit Y'CbCr 4:2:2 (CbYCrY).

EnumEntry.Name: YCbCr8_CbYCr
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to 8-bit YCbCr 4:4:4 (CbYCr).
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set to 8-bit YCbCr 4:4:4 (CbYCr).

EnumEntry.Name: RGB8
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Pixel format set to RGB 8.
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel format set RGB 8.

Enumeration.Name: PixelCoding
Enumeration.ToolTip: Coding of the pixels in the image.
Enumeration.Description: Coding of the pixels in the image.

Enumeration.Name: PixelColorFilter
Enumeration.ToolTip: Type of color filter that is applied to the image.
Enumeration.Description: Type of color filter that is applied to the image.

Enumeration.Name: PixelSize
Enumeration.ToolTip: Size of a pixel in bits.
Enumeration.Description: Size of a pixel in bits.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the AOI (in pixels).

Integer.Name: HeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum height of the image (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Maximum height of the image (in pixels).

Integer.Name: WidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum width of the image (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Maximum width of the image (in pixels).

IntSwissKnife.Name: HeightMax_Int
IntSwissKnife.Formula: ( MAX-OFFSETY % UNIT ) ? ( MAX-OFFSETY - ( ( MAX-OFFSETY ) % UNIT ) ) : ( MAX-OFFSETY )

IntSwissKnife.Name: WidthMax_Int
IntSwissKnife.Formula: ( MAX-OFFSETX % UNIT ) ? ( MAX-OFFSETX - ( ( MAX-OFFSETX ) % UNIT ) ) : ( MAX-OFFSETX )

Boolean.Name: ReverseX
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device. The AOI is applied after the flip.

Enumeration.Name: TestImageSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of test image that is sent by the camera.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of test image that is sent by the camera.

Enumeration.Name: VideoMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Current video mode.
Enumeration.Description: Current video mode.

Integer.Name: BinningVertical
Integer.ToolTip: Number of vertical pixels to combine together.
Integer.Description: Number of vertical pixels to combine together.

Integer.Name: BinningHorizontal
Integer.ToolTip: Number of horizontal pixels to combine together.
Integer.Description: Number of horizontal pixels to combine together.

Integer.Name: PixelDynamicRangeMin
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the minimum pixel value transferred from the camera.
Integer.Description: Indicates the minimum pixel value transferred from the camera.

Integer.Name: PixelDynamicRangeMax
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the maximum pixel value transferred from the camera
Integer.Description: Indicates the maximum pixel value transferred from the camera.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).

Enumeration.Name: ExposureAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the automatic exposure mode when Exposure Mode is Timed.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic exposure mode when Exposure Mode is Timed.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure set to manual control.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure set to manual control.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure is automatically adjusted once, then returns to Off.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure is automatically adjusted once, then returns to Off.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure is automatically adjusted by the camera
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure is automatically adjusted by the camera

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: Exposure time in microseconds when Exposure Mode is Timed.
Float.Description: Exposure time in microseconds when Exposure Mode is Timed.

Float.Name: ExposureTimeAbs
Float.ToolTip: Exposure time in microseconds when Exposure Mode is Timed.
Float.Description: Exposure time in microseconds when Exposure Mode is Timed.

Float.Name: AutoExposureTimeLowerLimit
Float.ToolTip: Lower limit of the Auto Exposure (us) parameter
Float.Description: Lower limit of the Auto Exposure (us) parameter

Float.Name: AutoExposureTimeUpperLimit
Float.ToolTip: Upper limit of the Auto Exposure (us) parameter
Float.Description: Upper limit of the Auto Exposure (us) parameter

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the acquisition of the device at the end of the current frame.
Command.Description: Stops the acquisition of the device at the end of the current frame.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire in multi-frame acquisition mode.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire in multi-frame acquisition mode.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateEnabled
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables manual control of the camera frame rate.
Boolean.Description: Enables manual control of the camera frame rate.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic frame rate adjustment.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the mode for automatic frame rate adjustment.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of trigger to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of trigger to configure.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls whether or not the selected trigger is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls whether or not the selected trigger is active.

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.ToolTip: Generates an internal trigger if Trigger Source is set to Software.
Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger if Trigger Source is set to Software.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input line to use as the trigger source.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.

Float.Name: TriggerDelay
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the delay (in microseconds) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.
Float.Description: Specifies the delay (in microseconds) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.

Boolean.Name: TriggerDelayEnabled
Boolean.ToolTip: Specifies whether or not the Trigger Delay is enabled.
Boolean.Description: Specifies whether or not the Trigger Delay is enabled.

Enumeration.Name: LineSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the physical line (or pin) of the external device connector to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the physical line (or pin) of the external device connector to configure.

Boolean.Name: LineStatus
Boolean.ToolTip: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line.
Boolean.Description: Returns the current status of the selected input or output Line.

Integer.Name: LineStatusAll
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the current status of all available Line signals at time of polling in a single bitfield.
Integer.Description: Returns the current status of all available Line signals at time of polling in a single bitfield.

Enumeration.Name: LineMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls whether the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.
Enumeration.Description: Controls whether the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.

IntSwissKnife.Name: LineModeInputAvailable_Int
IntSwissKnife.Formula: INDEX = 0 ? INQ0 : ( INDEX = 1 ? INQ1 : ( INDEX = 2 ? INQ2 : INQ3 ) )

IntSwissKnife.Name: LineModeOutputAvailable_Int
IntSwissKnife.Formula: INDEX = 0 ? INQ0 : ( INDEX = 1 ? INQ1 : ( INDEX = 2 ? INQ2 : INQ3 ) )

Boolean.Name: LineInverter
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected or output line.
Boolean.Description: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output line.

Enumeration.Name: LineSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected line.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected line.

Boolean.Name: StrobeEnabled
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the strobe signal to be output to the selected line.
Boolean.Description: Enables the strobe signal to be output to the selected line.

Float.Name: StrobeDelay
Float.ToolTip: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the delay before starting the Strobe Signal.
Float.Description: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the delay before starting the Strobe Signal.

Float.Name: StrobeDuration
Float.ToolTip: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the Strobe Signal.
Float.Description: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the Strobe Signal.

Boolean.Name: UserOutputValue
Boolean.ToolTip: Sets the value of the bit to be output to the selected line.
Boolean.Description: Sets the value of the bit to be output to the selected line.

Integer.Name: LineDebouncerTimeRaw
Integer.ToolTip: Sets the raw value of the selected line debouncer time in microseconds.
Integer.Description: Sets the raw value of the selected line debouncer time in microseconds.

IntSwissKnife.Name: UserSetCurrent
IntSwissKnife.ToolTip: Indicates the user set that is currently in use.
IntSwissKnife.Description: Indicates the user set that is currently in use. At initialization time, the camera loads the most recently saved user set.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Factory default settings.
EnumEntry.Description: Factory default settings.

Command.Name: UserSetLoad
Command.ToolTip: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.
Command.Description: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.

Command.Name: UserSetSave
Command.ToolTip: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.
Command.Description: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetDefaultSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the default user set as the default startup set
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Factory default settings.
EnumEntry.Description: Factory default settings.

Boolean.Name: ChunkModeActive
Boolean.ToolTip: Activates Chunk Data.
Boolean.Description: Activates the inclusion of Chunk data in the payload of the image

Enumeration.Name: ChunkSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which chunk data to enable or control
Enumeration.Description: Selects which chunk data to enable or control

Boolean.Name: ChunkEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the inclusion of the selected Chunk data in the payload of the image.
Boolean.Description: Enables the inclusion of the selected Chunk data in the payload of the image.

Integer.Name: ChunkImage
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the image payload.
Integer.Description: Returns the image payload.

Integer.Name: ChunkCRC
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the CRC of the image payload.
Integer.Description: Returns the CRC of the image payload.

Integer.Name: ChunkFrameCounter
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the image count
Integer.Description: Returns the image count.

Integer.Name: ChunkOffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the Offset X of the image included in the payload.
Integer.Description: Returns the Offset X of the image included in the payload.

Integer.Name: ChunkOffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the Offset Y of the image included in the payload.
Integer.Description: Returns the Offset Y of the image included in the payload.

Integer.Name: ChunkWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the width of the image.
Integer.Description: Returns the width of the image.

Integer.Name: ChunkHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the height of the image.
Integer.Description: Returns the height of the image.

Float.Name: ChunkExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: Returns the exposure time used to capture the image.
Float.Description: Returns the exposure time used to capture the image.

Float.Name: ChunkGain
Float.ToolTip: Returns the gain used to capture the image.
Float.Description: Returns the gain used to capture the image.

Float.Name: ChunkBlackLevel
Float.ToolTip: Returns the black level used to capture the image.
Float.Description: Returns the black level used to capture the image.

Integer.Name: GenCPVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Major version of the specification.
Integer.Description: Major version of the specification.

Integer.Name: GenCPVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Minor version of the specification.
Integer.Description: Minor version of the specification.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.

Integer.Name: U3VMessageChannelID
Integer.ToolTip: Channel ID Used For The Message Channel.
Integer.Description: Channel ID Used For The Message Channel.

Integer.Name: U3VTimestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Current Device Time in ns.
Integer.Description: Current Device Time in ns.

Integer.Name: U3VTimestampIncrement
Integer.ToolTip: Timestamp Increment.
Integer.Description: Timestamp Increment.

Integer.Name: U3VAccessPrivilege
Integer.ToolTip: Access Privilege.
Integer.Description: Access Privilege.

Integer.Name: U3VVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: U3V Version.
Integer.Description: U3V Version.

Integer.Name: U3VVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: U3V Version.
Integer.Description: U3V Version.

Integer.Name: U3VCPCapability
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates additional features on the control channel.
Integer.Description: Indicates additional features on the control channel.

Boolean.Name: U3VCPSIRMAvailable
Boolean.ToolTip: Set if the device supports at least one device streaming interface.
Boolean.Description: Set if the device supports at least one device streaming interface.

Boolean.Name: U3VCPEIRMAvailable
Boolean.ToolTip: Set if the device supports at least one device event interface.
Boolean.Description: Set if the device supports at least one device event interface.

Boolean.Name: U3VCPIIDC2Available
Boolean.ToolTip: Set if the device supports IIDC2 register map.
Boolean.Description: Set if the device supports IIDC2 register map.

Integer.Name: U3VCPCapabilityHigh
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates additional features on the control channel.
Integer.Description: Indicates additional features on the control channel.

Integer.Name: U3VCPCapabilityLow
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates additional features on the control channel.
Integer.Description: Indicates additional features on the control channel.

Integer.Name: U3VCPConfigurationHigh
Integer.ToolTip: Configures additional features on the control channel.
Integer.Description: Configure additional features on the control channel.

Integer.Name: U3VCPConfigurationLow
Integer.ToolTip: Configures additional features on the control channel.
Integer.Description: Configures additional features on the control channel.

Integer.Name: U3VMaxCommandTransferLength
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the max supported command transfer length of the device.
Integer.Description: Specifies the max suuported command transfer length of the device.

Integer.Name: U3VMaxAcknowledgeTransferLength
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the max supported ack transfer length of the device.
Integer.Description: Specifies the max suuported ack transfer length of the device.

Integer.Name: U3VNumberOfStreamChannels
Integer.ToolTip: Number of Stream Channels and its Corresponding Streaming Interface Register Maps.
Integer.Description: Number of Stream Channels and its Corresponding Streaming Interface Register Maps.

Enumeration.Name: U3VCurrentSpeed
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the current speed of the USB link.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the current speed of the USB link.

Integer.Name: U3VMaxDeviceResponseTime
Integer.ToolTip: Max Response Time in ms.
Integer.Description: Max Resonse Time in ms.

Integer.Name: TLParamsLocked
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates whether a live grab is under way
